item.title: About
item.description: I’m currently a final-year undergraduate student in the School of Computer Science and Technology, @Beijing Institute of Technology, and a research intern @HKU NLP, supervised by Tao Yu. Also I’m an incoming master @Fudan DISC, will be supervised by Zhongyu Wei. Previously, I joined in the KG group in BIT, advised by Xin Xin. I come from Chongqing, China, a beautiful city ​​surrounded by mountains and rivers. My main research interest is Natural Language Processing, and I care about the extended abilities of LLMs.

item.title: Where Are We Going?
item.description: ChatGPT和GPT-4的出现给NLP从业者带来的影响是巨大的，我在知乎上看到了一个有趣的观点。

item.title: 🥰Friends😋
item.description: I spent a wonderful summer with them in Kunming, 2022 Yiming Wang Tianbao Xie Shuyang Jiang Chengxi Li Hongjin Su Yifan Li Yuandong Pu Ruiqiao Qiu Mengyu Bu

item.title: The Last Night
item.description: 现在是北京时间凌晨3:30，我和舍友正在通宵收拾行李，准备在凌晨5:00的时候坐班车离开学校。
